basic.description: A survey of production methods, architecture, and performance in western and eastern theatre traditions from early classical eras to the end of the 19th century.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Theatre History

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of B- in 6.0 units from (DRAM100; DRAM181;BISC100;BISC101), or permission of the Department.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from DRAM200; DRAM201; DRAM202; DRAM210.
